Select the Streamlabs widgets you would: 請選擇您喜歡的Streamlabs所提供的插件。這將會自動地加入成為你的場景。
Thanks viewers with notification popups: 以快顯視窗通知感謝觀眾
Most recent events into your stream: 大多最新事件都會呈現到你實況中
A jar that catches bits, tips, and more: 小費罐可捕捉小奇點、小費和其他
Your channel's chat in your stream: 將您頻道的聊天室加入您的直播中
Show off most recent donations to viewer: 向觀眾展示您最近收到的贊助
Give your viewers a donation target to h: 給你的觀眾一個贊助目標, 讓他們協助你達到
Give your viewers a follower target to h: 給你的觀眾一個追隨目標, 讓他們協助你達到
Give your viewers a bit target to help y: 給你的觀眾一個小奇點目標, 讓他們協助你達到
Give your viewers a subscriber target to: 給你的觀眾一個訂閱目標, 讓他們協助你達到
Show off how many viewers you have from: 從多平台顯示你的觀眾數
Give your viewers an opportunity of beco: 給你的觀眾一個成為Boss的機會
Rolling credits at the end of your strea: 捲動片尾感謝名單並在直播結束時播放
Widget Theme installed & activated. Clic: 插件主題被成功安裝並啟用。請點選此處來管理你的插件設定檔。
The Google Font to use for the text. Vis: 使用Google的字體。如需要，請訪問 http://google.com/fonts！常用字體︰ Open Sans, Roboto, Oswald, Lato, Droid Sans.
十六進制的一般文字顏色。
A hex code for the widget background. Th: 十六進制的插件背景顏色。只提供於預覽，不會顯示在實況中。
Note: This background color is for previ: 重要：背景顏色只適用於預覽，不會在實況中顯示。
Please note that when advanced media sha: Please note that when advanced media share is enabled, media will no longer play through your alert box widget. Media will only play through this media share widget.
Note: This background color is for previ: Note: This background color is for preview purposes only.It will not be shown in your stream.
This background color is for preview pur: This background color is for preview purposes only. It will not be shown in your stream.
